name: COVENTRY VILLAGE ASSOCIATES, Successor to Environmental Communities of Pennsylvania, Inc., Appellant, v. NORTH COVENTRY TOWNSHIP
name_abbreviation: Coventry Village Associates v. North Coventry Township

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
parties: COVENTRY VILLAGE ASSOCIATES, Successor to Environmental Communities of Pennsylvania, Inc., Appellant, v. NORTH COVENTRY TOWNSHIP.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
ZAPPALA, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Theodore O. Rogers, James E. McErlane, William P. Mahon, West Chester, for appellant.
Timothy F. Hennessey, Pottstown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
567 A.2d 1039
COVENTRY VILLAGE ASSOCIATES, Successor to Environmental Communities of Pennsylvania, Inc., Appellant, v. NORTH COVENTRY TOWNSHIP.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 11, 1989.
Decided Jan. 5, 1990.
Theodore O. Rogers, James E. McErlane, William P. Mahon, West Chester, for appellant.
Timothy F. Hennessey, Pottstown, for appellee.
Prior report: 113 Pa.Commw. 500, 537 A.2d 941.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDermott, zappala and papadakos, jj.
